data.author: Smartwatcher Technologies
data.description:
Download SmartWatcher to turn your Pebble watch into the ultimate personal safety solution. Then relax, knowing that in case any type of safety arises (such as a medical emergency, a fire, an attack or bullying/abuse) you can press your watch and help will be called instantly.

The members of your personal safety network will receive a notification, and they'll be able to track your location on a map. Depending on the situation they can talk to you, or contact the emergency services.

QUICK LAUNCH CONFIGURATION
To allow SmartWatcher to be started from any watchface with a long press of the down button:
1. Settings -> QUICK LAUNCH
2. Down Button -> SmartWatcher
data.title: SmartWatcher

data.author: Buzzterrier

changelog.release_notes: Enlarged the menu time font to ease selection.
Disabled back button during countdown.
New feature. The up button now pauses the countdown. The watch will do a short pulse every ten seconds as a reminder that it is paused.

A Simple app that counts down selected time to zero, then start a negative count. Presets ranges from forty five to one minute at five minute blocks. To preserve battery life, the countdown is a one second count for the first fifteen seconds, it then only updates every fifteen seconds after that. At the end of the countdown, the watch vibrates, then starts the negative count, every second. This app leveraged Steve Atkin's Tea Timer app.

data.description:
A simple app that counts down selected time to zero, then starts a negative count. Presets ranges from forty-five to one minute, at five minute intervals. To preserve battery life, the countdown is a one second count for the first fifteen seconds, it then only updates every fifteen seconds after that. At the end of the countdown, the watch vibrates, then starts the negative count, every second. 

NEW! The Up button now pauses and un-pauses the count down. A vibe reminder will alert you every ten seconds while paused.

latest_release.release_notes: Enlarged the menu time font to ease selection.

data.title: The Soccer Referee Timer

data.description:
Detect BPM (speed) of a song on your Pebble Time Round!
Whether you are a DJ and/or a musician, if you want to know the beats per minute (BPM) of a song or need a steady, metronome style on-beat flash, Takt is made for you!
Press the middle button to tap to the beat of a song. The BPM is shown on screen and the background changes color automatically with each beat. Two circular bars indicate the current position within the current bar and within 4 bars (assuming a 4/4 time signature). Reset bars with top button.

latest_release.release_notes: first release

data.title: Takt

data.description:
Find the nearest bike or parking spot in your city's bicycle rental scheme.
1) open app and it will detect your city and start finding bikes near your location
2) choose bike or parking (UP to find bikes to rent or DOWN to find a station to park your cycle)
3) see the direction and distance to the nearest available bikes / spaces

Covers all major cities and bike rental networks around the world (over 400) including:
Vélib (Paris)
Santander / Boris-bikes (London)
New York Citi Bike
Chicago Divvy
Montreal Bixi
Mexico Ecobici
Barcelona Bicing
Lyon Vélo'v
Nextbike

The first station shown to you will be the nearest station which has more than 4 bikes or spaces.
A red outline indicates that the compass is still calibrating.
The number of bikes available is kept updated.
Data provided by citybik.es. The accuracy of the real-time availability depends on which city is providing the data i.e. when Paris Vélib says there are 2 bikes left they have probably already been taken.

Love it? Donate https://paypal.me/caller

Français

Votre ville a-t-elle des cycles en libre-service? Localiser les vélos et points d’attaches libres les plus proches.
Choisissez soit trouver un vélo soit restituer votre vélo et localiser les stations avec la boussole.

Ça marche pour la plupart des réseaux de vélos en libre-service du monde.

Les vélos se mettent à jour automatiquement.

La première station est la plus proche ayant plus de 4 vélos ou points d'attache disponible.

latest_release.release_notes: Location error messages

data.title: Bike Sharer

data.description:
DISCLAIMER: This is a fork of Knibble by Indika Informatics with PTR compatability. 


Knibble In The Round is a simple stitch counter for knitters. It keeps track of rows and repeats and can also be configured to link repeats to row counts.


You can also save different projects.

The app does have support fro PT and OG but Knibble was designed for that and I decided for now to only allow PTR support. If the original developer folds my small alterations into his then I may remove this version.

latest_release.release_notes: Modified ptr code bits to follow best practices

data.title: Knibble In The Round

data.description:
Thanks for 100 ❤'s!

If you like Find My Phone give it a ❤!

Do you misplace your phone often, or just want to be ready just in case you do? Then Find my Phone is the right app for you. At the push of a button, an automated bot will call your phone so you can hear it from wherever you put it. Unfortunately, you must be in Bluetooth range (About 150 ft.) for it to work.

Estimated time to set up is 5 minutes. To set up: 
1) Go to https://ifttt.com/join and make an account
2) Go to https://ifttt.com/recipes/407620-find-my-phone-pebble-app (Linked below)
3) Connect the Maker and Phone Call Channel (This will not work for people that do not use a +1 phone number (USA))
4) In the box that says "Event Name" type "finding_phone" without the quotes
5) Click "Add"
6) Go to ifttt.com/maker and copy your key. DO NOT SHARE THIS KEY WITH ANYONE (Ex: tTfXIFRVJzu9suVW1K0g4k)
7) Install this app to your pebble
8) In the settings paste your key and click "Submit"
9) All done!

If you have problems setting up, go to the video tutorial for help: https://youtu.be/VZQzZnMtvQE 
Or, if that doesn't help go to the troubleshooter: https://goo.gl/K8xeER

After you have set the app up, you can re-open the app, and when you click select, your phone will start ringing!

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Chalk (Pebble Round)

data.title: Find my Phone

- Minor Stability improvements

SANITY RELEASE

- Preparing for better voice recognition fuzzy logic.

FIRST RELEASE!
Not for human consumption! ;)

data.description:
Vera Home Automation Control
[UI7 only]

VOICE SUPPORT!

*  Configure Scenes and Devices that you want in Config
*  Currently supports Switch & Dimmer class.  more to come...
*  Short press for toggle, long press to cycle dim (if supported)
*  Automatic switch between local or remote mode
*  Fast & efficient
*  Support voice dicatation. Still a bit rough....but it works. (back button)

A working Vera Remote control app!!

Nothing existing worked, so I wrote one.
The latest Vera authentication is quite complex.  This is why 3rd party apps are few and far between.  After some hours of tinkering I got it to work!!!
The voice part still needs some AI to really make it work well, and also needs some changes so that voice recognition happens fast with less button presses.

LONG PRESS BACK TO EXIT!!

Voice will eventually become a paid option. Free for now.

latest_release.release_notes: Added Locks

data.title: Vera Wiz

data.description:
The ultimate World time clock for Pebble Time and Round. Configurable for 35+ cities/time zones, including half-hour offset zones. 

Supports 3 favorite time zones. Cycle through the 3 favorites using up and down buttons. Push middle button for other functions. Compass included as extra function. Configuration menu on your watch. No need to use your phone for configuration.

Other features:
Supports 12/24 hour local clock
Weather icon with temperature in C or F (local weather)
Moon phase display
Battery load indicator
Local sunrise and sunset time
Days of week in English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Klingon.
A-Grade energy friendly (extremely low battery usage).
BT disconnect warning (temp goes red with optional vibration)
Keeps track of DST (US rules) and timezone date
DST on dual time can be set to Automatic, On or Off.

This watchapp comes with a bonus watchface. Both watchface and app for just $2.99 ! Download the watchface separately from the Pebble Store.

latest_release.release_notes: Added Pebble 2 data to about screen

data.title: World BloxX

data.description:
AirportInfo is the app for Pebbles that allows pilots to get information on airports. This could be their destination field, or departure field, or any other they desire. This app is also useful for querying codes/details on airports.

Instructions:
- Firstly, press select on the watchface screen.
- Next, enter either the ICAO or IATA code of the desired airport.
- Finally, read the information on-screen.

Features:
- Smart analogue watchface screen
- Tertiary Text input method (for codes)
- Full airport name
- ICAO and IATA code
- Runway length in ft and m
- Latitude + longitude
- Elevation
- Distance from current position (bearing soon to come)

latest_release.release_notes:
Version 1.0:
- Initial release, enjoy!

data.title: AirportInfo

changelog.release_notes:
NEXT + BACK function
Shows the time
Android app inclusive installer ready :)

data.description:
ONLY ANDROID

THIS WILL PROBABLY NOT WORK FOR YOU!


This watchapp lets you do the PC's PowerPoint/LibreOffice/OpenOffice -presentations NEXT and BACK functions. Additionally the time is displayed to have everything under control.

What is needed?
-your pebble
-a device where the presentation is on (PC)
-a USB cable
-your phone

This app works with all presentation softwares, which support left/right arrow for switching the pages: PowerPoint, OpenOffice or LibreOffice.


Download the companion app here: https://github.com/WuerfelDev/PPP/blob/master/android-debug.apk?raw=true


How it works:
Pebble to Phone (Bluetooth): NEXT
Phone to PC (USB): I am a Keyboard
Phone to PC (USB): press right-arrow key


IMPORTANT: You need a rooted phone (with OS and kernel) that supports 'hid-gadget-test'. Have a look here: https://github.com/pelya/android-keyboard-gadget#installation The app does the installation so you just need to make sure your phone got this kernel.

If you have Nethunter installed, you can directly run the app.

latest_release.release_notes:
NEXT + BACK function
Shows the time
Android app inclusive installer ready :)

data.title: PowerPoint Presenter

data.description:
HomeGenie is an open source, programmable, home automation server for smart connected devices and applications and is developed by G-Labs.

This Pebble Application will integrate to your HomeGenie installation and will present you with the list of groups you have defined and then will display the devices in each group.

This Application is still in Beta.

Features:
Arm/Disarm the Alarm
Turn On/Off any Switch
Display information from some Sensor Devices

Requirements:
To access your HomeGenie over the internet, you will need to open the correct ports on your router and use a static IP address, Dynamic DNS URL or your own domain URL.
Use your private IP address if you only want to use the app on your local network.

Please configure the application in settings before use.

latest_release.release_notes:
Fixed a few bugs in the app config process.
Fixed no username / password specified
Fixed internal IP address config

data.title: HomeGenie

data.author: Hull Softworks (Austin Hull)

changelog.release_notes: - Fixed API Key for real this time. Sorry about that!

- Houston, we're still alive!!!
- Updated Profile Configuration Systems to redirect to new, reactivated configuration page at steam.hullsoftworks.com
- Oh, and finally added support for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2 smart-watches!
- Remember to inform us regarding any operational bugs you encounter. We apologize for the extra-extended downtime of our server. Your stuff should be good-to-go now!

Version 1.0:
- Added very basic Friends List feature, allowing you to view up to five of your friends at a time.
- User Guides coming soon!
- Further code reorganization/improvements.

- Upon receiving a "COULD NOT RETRIEVE DATA" error, users may now re-attempt to load their profile data by clicking their Pebble's middle (Select) button.
- Small code improvements to organize and clean the program.

Build 0.75: Initial Published Release - Users may securely link their Steam profiles to their Pebble through Steam's OpenID authentication services. After successfully logging in through Steam, click the Save button to complete the process. Currently, users can currently view their general profile information. User guides will formally be added in the next release, and Friends List functionality is currently in the works. Program code will be cleaned and optimized as development continues.

data.description: Wrist Steam is a free, open-source application built to help bridge the gap between Pebble users and their Steam profiles. In development since mid-2014, Wrist Steam allows you to safely - and conveniently - link your Steam user profile to Wrist Steam via Steam's OpenID authentication service. As of right now, Wrist Steam allows you to view your own profile info, but more features are in the works, such as Friends Info (allowing you to see and track your friends activities within Steam), and (possibly) Wrist-TF2, a feature which could allow you to track your TF2 inventory on the go!

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed API Key for real this time. Sorry about that!

data.title: Wrist Steam

data.description:
Get real-time data from the STIB/MIVB right on your wrist. Current features include all those from the official app:

- Nearby stops: display waiting times for stops near you
- Favourite stops (long press the select button on a stop to add it to your favourites)
- All lines: check arrival times at any stop

Waiting times at a given stop can be refreshed by flicking your wrist. The language can be set to either English, Dutch or French in the settings.

Tweet feature suggestions to @PLPeeters.

data.description:
Because some days can be tough, Quebble sends you one motivational quote every day on your wrist. Get inspirational ideas and upgrade your mood with a simple quote. Be inspire and move forward!


How Does It Work?
--------------------------
1. Download and install the app on your watch.
2. Set your daily alarm. It allows you to choose when you want to receive your quote.
3. That's it! Your quote will be sent every day on your watch. Enjoy!


Contact & Thanks
--------------------------
If you find bugs, have problems using the app or if you're just interested in this project, feel free to contact me on Twitter (@bellanger_q) or to email me.

Thanks to Maxime (@DCMaxxx) and David (@davidmiotti) for helping me developing this app,

— Quentin.

latest_release.release_notes:
v2.2:
- Update menu icon

data.description:
Voice-to-Text-to-Speech converter for Pebble with Android:

Speak into your pebble microphone and have your words magically come out of your phone.  No companion app required!  Only works on Android phones, though, sorry Apple users.  It has a few other nifty features like showing you your phone's model number, battery percentage and charge status.

Also includes a "BEEP" phone finder or locator option for some model phones to find your phone find phone or scare your dog.

Initial release of PebblePATH:

-Shows the next train that is leaving from the selected PATH train stop in NY/NJ as well as two more after the next.
-Displays a minute by minute countdown until the train arrives. 
-No internet connection required (however your watch needs to be connected to your phone). 
-Scroll through different terminals on the selected station by hitting the up and down buttons.

data.description: PebblePATH is designed to show you when the next PATH train in the NYC/NJ area is leaving. No internet connection required -- just select your desired stop and scroll through the destinations to see a live countdown until the next train arrives. Spend more time doing the things you love and less time waiting on a sticky platform for the train to arrive.

Keep track of your knitting row and repeat counts from the convenience of your wrist. Knibble even remembers where you left off--the counters are always saved to your Pebble!

I would love to hear suggestions for additional features. Just shoot me an email!

data.author: travipross

changelog.release_notes: Updated web host for config page

- Full release version
- Added color selection for classic (black & white) Pebble
- Miscellaneous code cleanup and bug fixes
- Changed behaviour of finish button; If timer is currently running when pressed, lap count is incremented (i.e. completing the final lap of a workout).

- Added color picker support! Pick a background color and accent color. Choose from a list of preset colors or a custom one. Custom colors are matched with the nearest equivalent on the Pebble Time color palette.
- Choose what is shown below current lap time on main screen (previous lap time vs. previous lap pace in minutes per mile/km)
- Fixed transparency of action icons
- Fixed font size being too large when main timer exceeds an hour
- Made configuration settings page persistent

v0.2:
- Bug fixes
- Added configuration page to change units and lap distance
- Updated app icon with transparency (for highlighting in main menu)

v0.1: 
- Current time
- Current lap time
- Previous lap time
- Distance in laps and meters (assuming 162 m / 0.1 mile track)
- Summary screen with: total time; total distance; average pace; best, worst, and average laps

Things to come: 
- Configuration (track distance, preferred units, preferred display)

data.description:
This stopwatch is intended for use when running, cycling, or swimming laps of a fixed distance. Useful information is displayed on the main screen such as: 
- Clock
- Total elapsed time 
- Current lap time
- Previous lap time
- Distance 

Completing the run with a long press of the middle button shows a summary page with useful stats about the workout, including: 
- Total time
- Total distance
- Average pace
- Best, average, and worst lap times

The app supports background timing, so it does not have to be left in the foreground to continue timing a workout. Unit choice and lap distance can be selected on the phone.

latest_release.release_notes: Updated web host for config page

data.title: Track Stopwatch

data.author: gibbage

changelog.release_notes:
Brawl start and finish times were an hour late for the Americas region since I didn't factor in that its actually PDT and not PST. Sorry! I live in Australia! Looks like this was a problem for the Europe region too.

If you think I've gotten the times wrong please hit the "Email Developer for Support" in your Pebble phone app and let me know. You can also raise issues in the GitHub repository: https://github.com/gibbage/tavern-brawl-time/issues
Fix potential bug for some users on an Pebble API that doesn't support Timeline.
Fix a bug introduced to get the screenshots sorted.
* Remove Basalt support... for now

* Displays name of Tavern Brawl, type of deck (premade/constructed/etc), how long left and description.
* Subscribes to Timeline
* Region configurable

data.description:
Sick of opening Hearthstone just to see details of the latest Tavern Brawl? Me too! So why not let your Pebble do the work for you?

"It's Tavern Brawl Time" is a simple watchapp that displays the details of the current Hearthstone Tavern Brawl. If there isn't a Brawl active, it displays when next one is starting. It also has Timeline integration to remind you when a Brawl is starting or finishing.

Brawl details are sourced from http://hearthstone.gamepedia.com/. Thanks heaps to the dedicated people who keep it up to date!

latest_release.release_notes:
Brawl start and finish times were an hour late for the Americas region since I didn't factor in that its actually PDT and not PST. Sorry! I live in Australia! Looks like this was a problem for the Europe region too.

If you think I've gotten the times wrong please hit the "Email Developer for Support" in your Pebble phone app and let me know. You can also raise issues in the GitHub repository: https://github.com/gibbage/tavern-brawl-time/issues

data.title: It's Tavern Brawl Time

data.author: Jessica Yeh

changelog.release_notes: Bug fixes

ios.name: OmniBuzz - Location Alarm for Bus, Train, or other Transit

data.description:
Never miss a bus stop again! Set a location alarm, then track the distance and direction on your Pebble. When you're almost there, the alarm goes off on your Pebble and phone.

This app is a must-have if you take public transit! For the Caltrain, Muni, BART, SamTrans, VTA, MARTA, DART, ORCA, MBTA, Washington Metro, Chicago L, SEPTA, PATH, Metro Rail, and any other bus, train, boat, or plane!

If you think creatively, it's useful for other things too! Use it for geocaching! Just enter in GPS coordinates into the search bar, and you can track the cache location with your Pebble. Another use is to see how far from your destination you are when you're biking or walking. Use it to help you get back to where you came from, like to find your car. It works without Internet, so you can use it on a plane to wake you up when you're near the airport. You can also use it to alert you when you're close to your destination if you're a passenger in a car.

Have a question, comment, or problem? Email me by tapping on "Email developer for support" below. I love getting mail and I'll respond quickly!

latest_release.release_notes: Bug fixes

data.title: OmniBuzz

data.author: Active Mind Technology, Inc.
data.description:
GAME GOLF is a FREE golf performance tracking, GPS rangefinder, and scorecard platform. Get the same statistics as the Pros! Know how far you are from the hole, how many shots you've taken, and update your score - all without taking your phone from your pocket. 

Works with the GAME GOLF smartphone app. 

Just tell us what club you used and we’ll provide: 
- greens in regulation 
- fairways hit 
- approach shot dispersion 
- scrambling 
- putts per hole 
- average distances 
- distances per club 
- club usage 
- more

data.description:
Easily get current Ether or Bitcoin value on your watch!

Supported tickers: BTCEUR, BTCHKD, BTCUSD, ETHBTC, ETHEUR, ETHUSD, REPBTC.
Data is fetched from Gatecoin public API.
Please note that since Gatecoin does not provide ETHUSD ticker, it is an estimation based on ETHBTC and BTCUSD tickers.

Long press UP or DOWN to switch all the lights On or Off.

Hue ON-OFF is not affiliated with Philips company. Hue and all other Philips product names are trademarks or registered trademarks of Philips.
JsHue: https://github.com/blargoner/jshue

- Brightness steps are now from 1 to 10 instead from 1 to 255

data.description:
This is an app to see how fast the pitcher is throwing. Please leave a "heart" if you like it!

First go to the settings and select your type of Baseball (Official Baseball is default), Accuracy (Medium is default), and Recording pitches (Yes is default). Now go back to the main screen. As soon as the pitcher releases the ball click select, and when the catcher catches the ball click it again. The MPH will be displayed at the top. If record pitches is set to "Yes" you can hit down to see the logs of the pitches.

Features:

• Speed of ball thrown
• Accuracy change
• Record throws
• Change for different types of Baseball games:
   • Official Baseball
   • Softball
   • Little Leauge
   • Pony Leauge
   • Bronco Leauge
   • Mustang Leauge
   • Pinto Leauge
   • Coach Pitch
   • Softball (16 and under)

latest_release.release_notes: Initial Release

changelog.release_notes: Fix for users being locked at the main menu while trying to escape out of the app before making a selection from the menu. Side effect is that some items return you to the watch face while exiting the selection. Fixed a couple typos.

Added a new prayer menu and added in various prayers. Updated prayer menu color so it's more Aplite friendly to read. Fixed an issue with the About card escaping back to the splash screen. General code clean up.
Added a prayer menu so folks don't have to scroll. General code clean up, learning as I go. Fixing what I had previously just broke for Aplite users.

Added in the Pope's monthly intentions for 2016 which updates every month (Thanks Chris for the suggestion). Updated the rosary mysteries screen so there is no need to scroll.  The text is smaller, which might be reverted in a future release.

Update splash screen colors to make them more aplite friendly. Corrected the return to the menu bug so that when backing out of a menu selection doesn't return the user to the main app menu. Updated various small issues with the Rosary and Confession texts.
First release. All local content, there is no code that queries any data from the net through the app. The app is a simple javascript app and my very first developer attempt.

data.description: This app was an endeavor to provide a Catholic prayer guide for daily use.  All of the basics are found in this app for your daily prayer life.  The rosary updates daily to show you the current mysteries for that day. Other items include Divine Mercy chaplet how to, basic prayers, a confession guide, and stations of the cross.  Future plans to add daily readings and saint of the day.

data.description:
The 511NY app displays weather and traffic information to help you navigate the roadways of New York State.

When launched, you can view your local weather by selecting the first menu item. The closest recorded road hazards are displayed when you choose the Road Hazards item. The roadway hazard list is sorted by distance from your location. Your location is based on your smart phone GPS, so make sure Location Services are enabled for your Pebble Time smart phone app.

A list of traffic cameras is next in the main menu, also sorted based on your location. When viewing a traffic cam, the UP button displays the camera name, the MIDDLE button refreshes the camera image, and the DOWN button displays the distance to the camera.

The Compass and Map features are next. The compass may need you to rotate your Pebble in a figure eight motion a few times for calibration. When viewing the map, use the UP and DOWN buttons for zooming, and the MIDDLE button to refresh your location.

There are custom settings for text size, automated reloading of information, and GPS accuracy.

This app was originally created for the DevPost HackFrost competition in February, 2016.

latest_release.release_notes: 1.5 Last update time fix

data.title: 511NY

data.description:
Français

Cette application est un compteur à 2 chiffres. Le premier fait référence à une "portion" et le deuxième à une "quantité totale". 
L'application affiche:
- Le rapport "portion" / "quantité totale"
- Le pourcentage: ("portion" / "quantité totale") * 100

Elle propose les options suivantes:
- L'appuis sur le bouton sélection permet d'ajouter ou de retirer une unité (+1 ou  -1) aux valeurs "portion" et "quantité totale".
- L'appuis long sur le bouton sélection permet d'afficher plus d'options: activer ou désactiver le vibreur ou réinitialiser les valeurs de "portion" et "quantité totale". 

A noter que:
- Ajouter +1 à la "portion" ajoute aussi +1 à la "quantité totale"
- Retirer -1 à la "portion" retire aussi -1 à la "quantité totale"

latest_release.release_notes:
- Add time on top bar

- - Add Configuration Menu

data.description:
Simple reference tool for learning the names and articulations of carpal bones found in the wrist, right from your own wrist! No color yet!

Features: 

1. Name of carpal bone with a handy mnemonic name below each bone. 

2. Small image indicating the general position of the selected bone. 

3. On selecting a particular bone, short information on the articulations with other adjacent bones is presented in a scrollable window. 

The mnemonic used is: "Some Lovers Try Positions That They Cannot Handle". This is a common device for memorising the bones and their order.

latest_release.release_notes:
Initial Release!
Written with Pebble.js as practice. Very new to coding and my C version is giving me issues.

Future Releases may include:
Add colour for Pebble Time
Use Wikipedia information instead of hard-coded facts
Utilise the full power of C and Javascript!

data.description:
Track your friends and family using Amicudar, a radar display on your wrist! Personalize with one of the included avatars and create a geofence to be notified when others are nearby.

SETUP
1) Install Amicudar.
2) Open Settings on your phone and enter a user and group name.
3) Send your friends and family your group name.

Then use Amicudar's menu system to choose an avatar, select metric/imperial, define a geofence, select an update interval, and show/hide the time.

USAGE
• The up/down buttons zoom in/out
• Shake to activate the display for 1 minute. The compass will show your actual heading and the progress bar will countdown to the next update.
• Joining and leaving the group is as simple as opening and closing Amicudar. You'll automatically be removed from the group after a little while once you switch to a watchface or another app.
• The status bar turns red if an update fails.

We're currently in beta and we would appreciate your feedback!

latest_release.release_notes: Increased max distance to 5000 km/3000 miles

data.title: Amicudar

Bug fixes
Added support for the Settings plugin

New features of Sal version 2.0:
- Downloadable plugins for faster results and plugin updates without needing app updates
- Plugin update status text

New features:
- Added timezone support
- Added support for the timeline, in preparation for reminder support

Bug Fixes:

- Improved battery life by removing the ping timer between the watch and the phone

Bug Fixes:

- Slowed down screen redraw rate, to improve battery life
Added ability to set user's WolframAlpha API key in app settings
First version

data.description:
Sal is a personal AI assistant for your Pebble.

Features:
- Speak to Sal via the Pebble's built-in microphone
- Downloadable plugins stored on the phone for faster responses
- Answers general knowledge questions
- Nearby business search
- Today's weather and temperature
- Movie recommendations
- Today's sunrise and sunset times
- Time/date questions (eg. "What day of the week is it on the 20th of October")


Hint: You can assign Sal to one of the Pebble's shortcut keys. Then, when you want to speak to Sal, simply hold down the key and speak when the microphone icon appears.

Currently only English is supported.

This app is a work in progress that I am doing in my spare time, and as such may not be reliable or accurate, and will probably have many bugs. Also note that all interactions are logged (as text) in order to improve Sal's knowledge and abilities.

Attributions:
- Business search: foursquare.com
- Business search: yelp.com
- Movie recommendations: trakt.tv
- Rough location lookup: freegeoip.net
- Sunrise/sunset times: sunrise-sunset.org
- Weather forecast lookup: wunderground.com
- General knowledge questions: wolframalpha.com

latest_release.release_notes: Fix for long requests freezing on iOS by keeping the phone awake for 30 seconds after a request.

data.title: Sal

data.description:
You need an easier way of tracking the number of laps you do around that oval, or, the number of times you drink a glass of water.

Whatever you need to keep track of, keep it simple, with +1, the simplest item counter.

Tap either SELECT or UP to add one to your count. Once you have finished, reset it, by holding DOWN.

latest_release.release_notes: We have added some style, with a menu icon.
